name: Loaded Dice (BluebsTopCat)
description:
Made in 25ish hours for the GMTK 2022 Jam.

Loaded dice is a fast paced arena survival game based around rolling yourself into enemies. Knock out as many enemies as you can in 60 seconds, and believe in the luck of the dice!

For best performance, download game to play.

CONTROLS:

Left click to aim, then pull back!



Release To Throw!

CREDITS:

art, music, programming, design - Jane P - @bluebscat

Some sound effects - zapsplat.com

Playtesting - Henry, Zoe, Laura
